name: generate_word_cloud_chart
description: Generate a word cloud chart to show word frequency or weight through text size variation, such as, analyzing common words in social media, reviews, or feedback.

data.description: Data for word cloud chart, such as, [{ value: 4.272, text: '形成' }].

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
